posts.post_title: SOLD N28 Bennett, Caruthers, Glasscock, & Mulvey
posts.post_content: SOLD--'m asking $650. for the lot (shipped).  Bennett (SGC 30)--Caruthers (PSA Authentic/Altered)--Glasscock (SGC 10)---Mulvey (SGC 30/was PSA 3).  Please email me at jpcw1999@yahoo with any questions/offers.SOLD
